title.rendered: Continuous Delivery of Stateful Applications with Kubernetes (in Production)

content.rendered:
In this week’s webinar, we were proud to welcome stateful application expert and the original Kubernetes PM Eric Han, from Portworx. He joined Kubernaut Dan Garfield to share the do’s and don’ts of running stateful applications on Kubernetes.

In this webinar, we provided:

  • An Intro to Stateful Apps
  • Best Practices
  • Functional Testing w/ Data
  • Continuous Delivery w/ Data
  • Demos + Q&A!

Check out the full webinar here:

Watch the webinar

 

Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!

Have questions? Schedule a 1:1 with us by clicking here
